meta.description: Optimization problem for maximizing profit from raising cows, sheep, and chickens

params.name: manure
params.description: Manure production per animal per day

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of animal to raise

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[a] - feed_cost[a]) * x[a] for a in ANIMALS)

constraints.name: manure_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(manure[a] * x[a] for a in ANIMALS)
constraints.description: Maximum manure that can be cleaned per day

constraints.name: max_chickens
constraints.description: Maximum number of chickens that can be raised

constraints.name: min_cows
constraints.description: Minimum number of cows to meet demand

constraints.name: min_sheep
constraints.description: Minimum number of sheep to meet demand

constraints.name: total_animals
constraints.description: Total number of animals cannot exceed 100
